pkgmetadata.longdescription: cmd3 - A dynamic CMD shell with plugins=======================================cmd is an extension for the CMD class with the following features:* commands are loaded from plugin directories * usage of docopts as part of the command creation* variable substitution* execution of python commands* scripts loadable from a script directoryThrough these extensions cmd becomes very flexible and can be used toextend command shell interface through simple add-ons via very simpleplugins provided as classes.The documentation is located at * http://cloudmesh.github.com/cmd3/
